SetLock.name: SetLock
SetLock.description: Set the lock to the current inline text content control. "contentLocked" - content cannot be edited. "sdtContentLocked" - content cannot be edited and BlockLvlSdt cannot be deleted. "sdtLocked" - BlockLvlSdt cannot be deleted.

params.name: sLockType
params.description: The type of the lock applied to the inline text content control.

GetLock.name: GetLock
GetLock.description: Get the lock type of this container.

SetTag.name: SetTag
SetTag.description: Set the tag attribute for this container.

params.name: sTag
params.description: The tag which will be added to the current container.

GetTag.name: GetTag
GetTag.description: Get the tag attribute for this container.

SetLabel.name: SetLabel
SetLabel.description: Set the label attribute for this container.

params.name: sLabel
params.description: The label which will be added to the current container. Can be a positive or negative integer from -2147483647 to 2147483647.

GetLabel.name: GetLabel
GetLabel.description: Get the label attribute for this container.

SetAlias.name: SetAlias
SetAlias.description: Set the alias attribute for this container.

params.name: sAlias
params.description: The alias which will be added to the current container.

GetAlias.name: GetAlias
GetAlias.description: Get the alias attribute for this container.

GetAllContentControls.name: GetAllContentControls
GetAllContentControls.description: Get the collection of content control objects in the content control.

GetAllParagraphs.name: GetAllParagraphs
GetAllParagraphs.description: Get a collection of paragraph objects in a content control.

GetAllTablesOnPage.name: GetAllTablesOnPage
GetAllTablesOnPage.description: Get a collection of tables on a given absolute page. This method can be a little bit slow, because it runs the document calculation process to arrange tables on the specified page.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Clear the contents from a content control.

Delete.name: Delete
Delete.description: Remove content control and content. If keepContent is true, the content is not deleted.

params.name: keepContent
params.description: Specifies if the content will be deleted or not.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Apply text settings to content of content control.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The properties that will be set to the content of content control.

GetAllDrawingObjects.name: GetAllDrawingObjects
GetAllDrawingObjects.description: Get the collection of drawing objects in the document.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Get the content control that contains the current content control.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Get the table that contains the content control.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Get the table cell that contains the content control.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Push a paragraph or a table or BlockLvl content control to actually add it to the document.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The type of the element which will be pushed to the document.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Add a paragraph or a table or a blocklvl content control to the document.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The type of the element which will be added to the document.

AddText.name: AddText
AddText.description: Add a text to the current content control.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text which will be added to the content control.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Return a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified content control.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: Search for the scope of a content control object. The search results are a collection of ApiRange objects.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a container for the document content.
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing a container for the document content.
